description:
Jason Harwood is the experienced attorney behind Harwood Legal, PLLC. He is a Southern West Virginia native and proudly established his law office in his lifelong home of Logan. Not surprisingly, when residents need legal representation, they often turn to this law office. As an active member of his community, most of Jason's clients already met him before walking through his office doors.

Over the years, Harwood Legal, PLLC, had expanded its services. It now includes a full range of practice areas, which include the following:

• Bankruptcy
• Personal injury
• Family law
• Criminal defense
• Workers' compensation
• Assault and battery (plaintiff)

Jason started his legal career as a public defender in Logan County. He then transitioned into working as a prosecuting attorney. From there, he went on to serve his community as a family court judge in the Logan District. After this, he started a private practice that allowed him to combine years of experience from behind the bench and on both sides of the aisle to help his clients achieve the results they seek. This law office is a favorite among West Virginians who want to work with a local they can relate to and who has dedicated his career to serving his community.

Harwood Legal, PLLC, is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code.
